limited.title: Drill: A Trap in the Forest
limited.description: This practice drill is a simulation from the archive to help you prepare for the coming battle. The current settings will allow you to reenact putting down a huge enemy incursion from the past. Your objective is to defeat a multitude of large enemies in each region.
